thread.title: White House Drafting Bill Against Hostile Drones

author: Andy Pasztor
title: White House Drafting Bill Against Hostile Drones
text:
BALTIMOREâ€”White House officials are preparing legislation that for the first time would allow federal law enforcement and homeland security to disrupt, take over or even destroy suspected hostile drones in U.S. airspace.
The goal is to break the logjam preventing substantial expansion of commercial uses of unmanned aerial systems, because those agencies currently lack authority to disrupt or neutralize suspicious aircraft piloted from the ground.
